meaning: to let go of, to give up, to part with

examples.chinese: 許多國民黨朋友對中國大陸有難以割捨的情感
examples.translation: Many KMT members have emotions toward mainland China that are hard to let go of.
I can't let go of this relationship.
Some things are hard to part with.

sourceEnglish: to be partical, to be pragmatic about〜
